data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Paktya, Afghanistan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paktya, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 80 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Paktya.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Paktya, Afghanistan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Pashtun, Southern people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Pashtun, Southern people.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Paktya access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Paktya you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Paktya, Afghanistan has a population of 503,600.

We estimate Paktya has 80 people who might know Jesus, 16 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 503,504 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,294 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Paktya.
